price: (50) And We have certainly distributed it among them that they might be reminded,[1032] but most of the people refuse except disbelief.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَٰهُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ لِيَذَّكَّرُواْ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورٗا
footnotes: [1032]- Of Allāh's ability to bring the dead to life.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣarrafnāhu baynahum liyadhakkarū fa-abā aktharu al-nāsi illā kufūran
